column2: Illinois top court to review Altria $10.1 bln cigarette verdictUPDATE 1-Illinois top court to review Philip Morris verdict Sept 24 The Illinois Supreme Court agreed on Wednesday to hear Philip Morris USA's appeal of a $10.1 billion verdict accusing the Altria Group Inc unit of misleading consumers about the risks of smoking "light" cigarettes.  UPDATE 1-Illinois top court to review Philip Morris verdict Sept 24 The Illinois Supreme Court agreed on Wednesday to hear Philip Morris USA's appeal of a $10.1 billion verdict accusing the Altria Group Inc unit of misleading consumers about the risks of smoking "light" cigarettes. Exclusive: Amazon tests smart home gadgets
column3: expands hardware lab SAN FRANCISCO Amazon.com Inc will boost staffing at its secretive Silicon Valley-based hardware unit by at least 27 percent over the next five years as it tests Internet-connected "smart" home gadgets such as a one-button device to order supplies.

column2: India's Modi asks Pepsi
